availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Calvin Caroline Arrington (Fulton County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Fulton County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Nancy Owens Arrington in Smith County, Tennessee, on November 21, 1849. Father of Elizabeth F. Arrington, William S. Arrington, Gennette V. Arrington, Alice B. Arrington, and Mary Lee Arrington. Laborer in Smith County in 1850. Farmer in Fulton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Smith County, South Division, p. 319A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, Hickman, p. 439.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, District 1, p. 210B.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, Tennessee, Smith County Marriage Licenses and Bonds, 1838-1881, p. 58 of 395 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Calvin Arrington (1828-1904)," Memorial #67886301, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67886301 (accessed September 9, 2020).
